contents.name: Inventory Management Services
contents.summary: Managing your mechanical seals is a breeze with our innovative Inventory Management Service. We use the Kanban system to ensure accurate seal forecasting and inventory. We offer custom inventory planning for better, shorter lead time, in order to minimize shutdown operations.

contents.name: After Sales Services
contents.summary: We offer failure analysis service to all our customers. We determine the cause of seal failure, or determine why your pumps fail, then offer solutions. We offer upgrades and replacement seals that are designed to perform better and last longer.
